metadata.title: CVE-2009-3583 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the Preferences menu item inSQL-Ledger 2.8.24 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrarylocal files via a .. (dot dot) in the countrycode field.

criterions.comment: sql-ledger package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
